get.summary: Gets the default account information set for the scope.

parameters.description: The scope for the default account.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The Id of the scope object, for example if the scope is "Subscription" then it is the ID of that subscription.

parameters.description: The Id of the scope object, for example if the scope is "Subscription" then it is the ID of that subscription.

post.summary:
Gets a list of features and their status for the location and subscription.
Status of enabled features will be true. Status of disabled features will be false.
Features that don't exist will be excluded from the results.
